tag_list: startups, stanford, gsb, klout, salesforce, bai, social-media, entrepreneurship, vc
overview:
Don is the Director of Business Development for Klout, where he oversees strategic partnerships. In this role, Don has sourced, managed, and closed transformative partnerships with Gilt Groupe, Nike, Cathay Pacific, Reuters, Bonobos, Rent the Runway, Chloe and Isabel, and Moo.

Responsible for growth and strategy, Don also led Klout’s first acquisition (Blockboard) and works closely with the product teams on monetization, new business models, the Klout API, and data partners.

Don holds an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business, where he was President of the class and graduated cum laude from UCLA with a degree in Business Economics.
